languages.text: {n}Ловушка сенешаля наивна. Имя основателя династии забыто за тысячелетия, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}вам ли не знать{/d}?{/n}

{n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard ist naiv, wenn er denkt, du tappst in seine Falle. Der Name des Gründers der Dynastie ist in den Jahrtausenden ihres Bestehens in Vergessenheit geraten. Als würde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}dich{/d} etwas derart Triviales verblüffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard ist naiv, wenn er denkt, du tappst in seine Falle. Der Name des Gründers der Dynastie ist in den Jahrtausenden ihres Bestehens in Vergessenheit geraten. Als würde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}dich{/d} etwas derart Triviales verblüffen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard est bien naïf, s'il s'imagine que vous allez tomber dans son piège. Le nom du fondateur de la dynastie a sombré dans les limbes de son histoire multimillénaire. Comme s'il pouvait {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}vous{/d} poser une colle aussi facilement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard est bien naïf, s'il s'imagine que vous allez tomber dans son piège. Le nom du fondateur de la dynastie a sombré dans les limbes de son histoire multimillénaire. Comme s'il pouvait {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}vous{/d} poser une colle aussi facilement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard es un ingenuo si cree que caerás en su trampa. El nombre del fundador de la dinastía se perdió a lo largo de los milenios. Como si algo tan trivial bastara para frustrarte a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}ti{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard es un ingenuo si cree que caerás en su trampa. El nombre del fundador de la dinastía se perdió a lo largo de los milenios. Como si algo tan trivial bastara para frustrarte a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}ti{/d}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが自分の罠に嵌るなどと考えるとは、アベラルドは実に甘い。王朝の創設者の名は、千年以上の歴史の中で忘れ去られてしまった。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}あなた{/d}がそんな些細なことでつまずくとでも思っているのだろうか。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが自分の罠に嵌るなどと考えるとは、アベラルドは実に甘い。王朝の創設者の名は、千年以上の歴史の中で忘れ去られてしまった。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}あなた{/d}がそんな些細なことでつまずくとでも思っているのだろうか。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德太天真了，居然以为你会落入他的圈套。在几千年的历史长河之中，王朝创始人的名字早已散佚。莫非阿贝拉德真的以为，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}你{/d}会被这么拙劣的问题难倒吗？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德太天真了，居然以为你会落入他的圈套。在几千年的历史长河之中，王朝创始人的名字早已散佚。莫非阿贝拉德真的以为，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}你{/d}会被这么拙劣的问题难倒吗？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard bu tuzağa düşeceğini sanıyorsa naiflik ediyor. Hanedanlığın bin yıllara yayılmış tarihi sırasında kurucusunun ismi unutulmuştur. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Sen{/d} böyle basit bir soru karşısında tökezleyecek değilsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is naive to think that you could fall into his trap. The name of the dynasty's founder has been forgotten over the millennia of its history. As if {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}you{/d} could be stumped by something so trivial.{/n}
